summary:
**Summary of ASX Announcement:**  

- **Acquisition Update:** Adriatic Metals Plc confirms publication of a Q&A document to clarify details of the recommended acquisition by DPM via a **scheme of arrangement** (terms unchanged).  
- **Availability:** Q&A document accessible on Adriatic’s investor relations website ([link provided](https://www.adriaticmetals.com/investors/offer/)).  

**No new material information** (e.g., revised terms, timeline, or capital structure impacts) identified beyond the original Scheme Document.
